title: The Sun newspaper logo, headlines and body text
content:
hi im trying to identify the typefaces used in the sun newspaper - logo, headlines and body.

[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/19/The\_Sun\_Gotcha.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121120024047/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/19/The_Sun_Gotcha.jpg "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/1/19/The\_Sun\_Gotcha.jpg")

any ideas?

regards  
mike
author: Michael Green

comments.content: was sure the logo was akzidenz grotesk extended italic but its not an exact match.
[Tempo](http://web.archive.org/web/20121120024047/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/tempo_std_ot_virtual/) for headlines. Logo most likely custom.
